A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After a long wait we had \"Star Wars VII: the Force Awakens\" which was a great tribute and nostalgia for Episode 4. Then came \"Star Wars: Rogue One\" which was a nice add-on explaining the Death Star among many others gaps we had about the movies. I have been waiting for \"Star Wars VIII - The last Jedi\" ever since the Force Awakens was released. That said I am not a hard core fan of Star Wars but I enjoy them a lot except of course for the Episode 1\, 2 and 3. I will not talk about any spoiler concerning this movie but I would like to share 1 thought and that is they are unable to make any evil person better than Darth Vader or at least match it and that is the sad part in Star Wars 7 and 8. Overall the movie is entertaining but contains some far fetched concepts and does not put it at the classic level that we had hoped for.
